spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is correct, but there is an error in the rear wing where Bed 3 and Bed 4 windows are misplaced. The master suite window facing the front verandah is also incorrectly segmented.

structural_fidelity.notes: The transition between the Alfresco area and the Living room lacks the structural columns and thin-frame glazing indicated in the plan. Wall thicknesses are mostly consistent, but the entry portico structure is oversimplified.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture mapping is exceptionally high. Bed placements, kitchen island orientation, and the dining table positioning match the intended floor plan exactly.

aesthetic_quality.notes: High quality isometric rendering with consistent lighting. Clean geometry throughout, though the car model is slightly underscaled for a double garage footprint.

detected_errors.description: The window in Bed 4 is placed on the side wall instead of the rear wall per the plan.
Orientation of the laundry door to the exterior appears changed to a window.
The car scale in the garage is too small relative to the 5.91m width of the space.
Glazing frames on the Alfresco sliders are merged/simplified compared to the detailed plan lines.
